;;;66     {

;;;67         if (mode == 0)

;;;68         {
;;;69             for (uint16_t i = 0; i < recv_length; i++)
00000c  2700              MOVS     r7,#0

;;;70             {
;;;71                  *pbdata++ = Spi_ReadByte();	//Èí¼þÄ£ÄâSPI

;;;74     		return true;

;;;75         }

;;;77         {
;;;78             spi_master_recv_some_bytes(1, pbdata, recv_length);	//Ó²¼þSPI

;;;28         {

;;;30             {
;;;31                 Spi_WriteByte(pbdata[i]);

;;;33     		
;;;34     		return true;
